TEXT.TITLE: NORTH ATLANTIC INDUSTRIES INC <NATL> YEAR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 40 cts vs 30 cts Net 1,408,000 vs 1,038,000 Sales 35.2 mln vs 31.6 mln NOTE: Results restated for change to FIFO inventory accounting from LIFO, which reduced 1985 net 192,000 dlrs or five cts a share. Reuter
